description: This course teaches you an intuitive and novel way to setup and analyze a/b tests on your website so that you can come to the correct conclusions.   Don't be one of the many people who just starts running tests without a clear understanding of how to set it up and analyze correctly.  You will save yourself hours of arguing and months (or even years) of making decisions based on misinterpretations of what the data is telling you.
title: A/B Testing The Easy Way
